MA-500: Introduction to R Regina-Mae Dominguez - Fall 2024 MA-500: Introduction to R FANUCHÅNAN 2024: 8/14/2024 - 10/04/2024 Instructor Information Regina-Mae Dominguez | dominguezr@triton.uog.edu Office Hours & Location: Online by Appointments Course Introduction This markdown site will include notes, guides, and resources, while Moodle will be the central hub for the course as well as the platform for uploading and submitting homework assignments. As the course progresses, this site will be regularly updated to ensure it’s helpful, easy to navigate, and accessible whenever you need a reference. While this resource is designed to be useful, I strongly encourage you to take your own notes for a more personalized and detailed study guide.
